pages.text: Drums are special barrels that are needed to store corrosive fluids, that would dissolve wooden barrels.$(br2)Drums are needed to store $(thing)Sulfuric Acid$() and $(thing)Lemon Juice$().
Drums are made like $(l:tfc:mechanics/barrels)Barrels$(), but with metal sheets instead of lumber.
Drums can be made from any bronze, as well as from steel.
Blue steel drums can also hold lava.
